turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No much what are u needed today

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order me a tall cafe latte from Starbucks on 53rd in Davenport for pick up

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure would you like anything added to your latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok what type of milk would u like in your latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok do you want anything else

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok what time will you be picking it up

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I’ll let them know can I have them bill your card on file ending in 123

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok what name should I put for pickup

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok Dick skinner it is do u want me to confirm your order

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I’ve got a cafe latte with skim milk and 2 sugars ready in 15 minutes at the Starbucks on 53rd street

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes Starbucks way over charges do u still want it
